lab2.prompt: What is the generic name for Vyvanse?
What is the MOA of Methylphenidate?
choices: Blocks calcium channels in vascular smooth muscle
Blocks reuptake of norepinephrine and dopamine into the presynaptic neuron.
Inhibits Na+/Cl- reabsorption in the distal tubule
Blocks angiotensin II from binding to its receptor
answer: Blocks reuptake of norepinephrine and dopamine into the presynaptic neuron.
